hero.headline: RevOps Infrastructure
hero.description: We set up your complete sales system with CRM, automation, and reporting. Everything is ready to use in 2 days. No consultants needed. No long setup times.

comparison.title: Why Choose Our RevOps Setup?
comparison.subtitle: Stop paying consultants $200 per hour. Own your sales system.

pricing.title: How Many Sales Team Members Do You Have?
pricing.subtitle: We build your system based on your team size.

faqs.question: What CRM platforms do you support?
faqs.answer: We work with HubSpot, Salesforce, and Pipedrive. We help you choose the best one for your business size and budget.

faqs.question: Can you move our existing data?
faqs.answer: Yes. We migrate all your contacts, deals, and history from your old system to the new CRM. Nothing gets lost.

faqs.question: What automations are included?
faqs.answer: We set up lead scoring, email sequences, task automation, deal stage updates, and automated reporting. Everything your sales team needs.

faqs.question: Do you connect with our other tools?
faqs.answer: Yes. We integrate your CRM with email, calendar, marketing tools, and any other software you use daily.

faqs.question: What happens after the 48-hour setup?
faqs.answer: Your system is ready to use. We train your team and provide 5 years of support for any questions or updates you need.

faqs.question: Can we customize it later?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The system is yours. You can change anything. We also offer paid customization services if you need help.

hero.headline: Verified Lead List
hero.description: Get 1,000 verified B2B leads with direct phone numbers and emails. Skip the research. Start selling today. All leads are verified within the last 30 days.

comparison.title: Why Our Lead Lists Are Better
comparison.subtitle: Stop buying old, unverified contact lists.

pricing.title: How Many Leads Do You Need?
pricing.subtitle: Choose your list size. Pay once. Own forever.

faqs.question: How are the leads verified?
faqs.answer: We verify each contact 3 times: email validation, phone number check, and LinkedIn profile confirmation. Only verified contacts make it to your list.

faqs.question: What industries do you cover?
faqs.answer: We have leads in technology, manufacturing, healthcare, finance, retail, and professional services. Tell us your target industry and we build your list.

faqs.question: Can I choose specific criteria?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can specify industry, company size, job titles, location, and revenue range. We build a custom list for you.

faqs.question: How fresh is the data?
faqs.answer: All contacts are verified within the last 30 days. We also offer free quarterly updates to keep your list current.

faqs.question: What if the data is wrong?
faqs.answer: We guarantee 95% accuracy. If more than 5% of contacts are invalid, we replace them for free or give you a full refund.

faqs.question: Can I get leads for specific cities?
faqs.answer: Yes. We can target specific cities, states, or countries. Just tell us your geographic requirements.

hero.badge: Fix Email Spam Issues. Reach the Inbox.
hero.headline: Email Deliverability Checkup
hero.description: Find out why your emails go to spam. We check your domain health, fix technical issues, and improve your inbox delivery rate. Get a full report in 2 days.

comparison.title: Why Choose Our Email Checkup?
comparison.subtitle: Stop guessing why emails go to spam.

pricing.title: How Many Sending Domains Do You Have?
pricing.subtitle: We check each domain thoroughly.

faqs.question: Why are my emails going to spam?
faqs.answer: Common reasons: bad domain reputation, missing SPF/DKIM records, blacklisted IP, poor email content, or low engagement rates. We find the exact cause.

faqs.question: How long does the checkup take?
faqs.answer: We complete the full audit in 48 hours. You get a detailed report with all issues and our recommended fixes.

faqs.question: Will you fix the issues or just report them?
faqs.answer: We fix everything. We update your DNS records, configure authentication, and remove you from blacklists. You don't need technical knowledge.

faqs.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
faqs.answer: No. We handle all technical work. You just give us access to your domain settings and we do the rest.

faqs.question: What if my domain is blacklisted?
faqs.answer: We submit removal requests to all blacklists and monitor until you're fully removed. This usually takes 7-14 days.

faqs.question: Can you guarantee inbox delivery?
faqs.answer: We can't guarantee 100% (nobody can), but we typically improve inbox rates from 40-60% to 85-95% after our fixes.

hero.headline: Secure Email & Workplace Setup
hero.description: Get Microsoft 365 or Google Workspace set up with enterprise-level security. We handle everything: email, calendar, file storage, security policies, and team training.

comparison.title: Why Choose Our Workspace Setup?
comparison.subtitle: Stop struggling with complex IT setup.

pricing.title: How Many Users Do You Have?
pricing.subtitle: We set up secure workspace for your entire team.

faqs.question: Microsoft 365 or Google Workspace?
faqs.answer: We help you choose based on your needs. Microsoft is better for Office apps. Google is simpler and cheaper. We support both equally well.

faqs.question: Can you migrate from our current system?
faqs.answer: Yes. We migrate all emails, contacts, calendars, and files from any system (Gmail, Outlook, Exchange, etc.) with zero downtime.

faqs.question: What security features are included?
faqs.answer: We set up MFA, email encryption, anti-phishing, data loss prevention, mobile device management, and security monitoring. Enterprise-grade protection.

faqs.question: Do you handle compliance requirements?
faqs.answer: Yes. We configure GDPR, HIPAA, or SOC 2 compliance settings based on your industry requirements.

faqs.question: What about mobile device management?
faqs.answer: We set up policies to secure company data on phones and tablets. You can remotely wipe data if a device is lost.

faqs.question: Can we keep our existing email addresses?
faqs.answer: Yes. We keep your current email addresses (like john@yourcompany.com). Nothing changes for your customers.

hero.headline: Website Care Services
hero.description: We monitor your website 24/7, apply security updates, optimize performance, and fix issues before they affect your business. Daily backups included.

pricing.title: How Many Websites Do You Have?
pricing.subtitle: We protect all your websites.

faqs.question: What platforms do you support?
faqs.answer: We support WordPress, Shopify, Wix, Squarespace, Webflow, and custom websites. If it's online, we can protect it.

faqs.question: What happens if my site goes down?
faqs.answer: We get an instant alert and start fixing it immediately. Our average response time is under 1 hour. We restore from backup if needed.

faqs.question: Do you handle content updates?
faqs.answer: Basic care includes security and performance only. Content updates (text, images) are available as an add-on for $50/hour.

faqs.question: Can you fix hacked websites?
faqs.answer: Yes. We remove malware, clean infected files, update security, and restore from clean backups. Most hacks are fixed within 24 hours.

faqs.question: What about website redesigns?
faqs.answer: Website care is for maintenance only. We offer redesign services separately. Contact us for a custom quote.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency support?
faqs.answer: Yes. All care plans include 24/7 emergency support. If your site is down, we respond within 1 hour, even on weekends.
